ref.mixed-citation: B. Gompertz , “ XXIV. On the nature of the function expressive of the law of human mortality, and on a new mode of determining the value of life contingencies. In a letter to Francis Baily, Esq. F. R. S. &c,” Philos. Trans. R. Soc. London 115, 513– 583 ( 1825). 10.1098/rstl.1825.0026
